inclusion.criterion: Previously treated patients must have received no antineoplastic treatment for at least 4 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: In patients previously irradiated, the recurrent disease should be outside of the radiotherapy portal or have developed disease progression within the radiated field
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No concurrent chemotherapy, radiotherapy, immunotherapy, or hormone therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be alert, oriented, and have signed an informed consent in accordance with institutional policies and be aware of the investigational nature of the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must be willing to consent to using effective contraception while on treatment and for at least 3 months thereafter
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has impairment of hepatic, renal or hematologic function as defined by the following baseline laboratory values:
exclusion.label: triggers
